<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Set the product administrator"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/security/administrator"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets the selected user as an administrator of a product with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"productid":{"description":"Product ID","type":"string"},"userid":{"description":"User ID","type":"string"},"administrator":{"description":"Specifies if a user will be a product administrator or not","type":"boolean"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Object with the user security information","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
